meanings.definition: Treat (rubber) with sulfur at a high temperature to improve its strength and elasticity.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers vulcanise the rubber to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: It is important to vulcanise the rubber for better quality products.
meanings.sent3: Why did the rubber band go to the sauna? To get vulcanised!
meanings.sent4: The process of vulcanising rubber is like giving it a superpower.
meanings.sent5: After vulcanisation, the rubber became as tough as a superhero.

meanings.definition: To undergo the process of vulcanization.
meanings.sent1: Rubber bands vulcanise when exposed to high heat.
meanings.sent2: The rubber must vulcanise properly to be durable.
meanings.sent3: The rubber tire felt like it was going to a spa when it had to vulcanise.
meanings.sent4: The idea of rubber vulcanising is like a caterpillar turning into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: Watching rubber vulcanise is like seeing a magical transformation.
